task_description: Facing the building to your North (approx. 341°), estimate the height of the main building in front of you in meters. Answer with one number and a short rationale.

reason: To see the full structure of the target building (from ground to roof), I need to look up to capture the upper portion that's currently out of view, so I will rotate the camera upward to a pitch of 30° while keeping the current heading.
The target building is fully visible, appearing to be 8 stories tall; using a standard residential floor height of ~3 meters per story, the estimated total height is 24.0 meters.
